message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_XFV_SELECT_ALLPRODUCTIND
message.locale: A single product cannot be selected if All Products is also selected.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_SELECT_PRODUCT
message.locale: As this evidence approval does not apply to all products you must select the product that it applies to.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add an evidence approval check as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add an evidence approval check as this product has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_FV_PERCENTAGE_VALUE
message.locale: Percentage value must be non negative and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: Approval Check must not be canceled already.
Approval Check must not be cancelled already.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_RV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: Approval Check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
Approval Check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_MULTIPLE_VALID
message.locale: Multiple evidence approvals of type '%1c' exist. Please contact your system administrator.
